001package imagingbook.common.math.eispack;
002
003public abstract class QZVAL {
004
005        // EISPACK Routines, see http://www.netlib.org/eispack/
006
007        /**
008         * <p>
009         * This subroutine is the third step of the qz algorithm for solving generalized
010         * matrix eigenvalue problems, Siam J. Numer. Anal. 10, 241-256 (1973) by Moler
011         * and Stewart. This description has been adapted from the original version
012         * (dated August 1983).
013         * </p>
014         * <p>
015         * This subroutine accepts a pair of real matrices, one of them in
016         * quasi-triangular form and the other in upper triangular form. it reduces the
017         * quasi-triangular matrix further, so that any remaining 2-by-2 blocks
018         * correspond to pairs of complex Eigenvalues, and returns quantities whose
019         * ratios give the generalized eigenvalues. it is usually preceded by qzhes and
020         * qzit and may be followed by qzvec.
021         * </p>
022         * <p>
023         * On output:
024         * </p>
025         * <ul>
026         * <li><strong>a</strong> has been reduced further to a quasi-triangular matrix
027         * in which all nonzero subdiagonal elements correspond to pairs of complex
028         * eigenvalues.</li>
029         * 
030         * <li><strong>b</strong> is still in upper triangular form, although its
031         * elements have been altered. b[n-1][0] is unaltered.</li>
032         * 
033         * <li><strong>alfr</strong> and <strong>alfi</strong> contain the real and
034         * imaginary parts of the diagonal elements of the triangular matrix that would
035         * be obtained if a were reduced completely to triangular form by unitary
036         * transformations. Non-zero values of <strong>alfi</strong> occur in pairs, the
037         * first member positive and the second negative.</li>
038         * 
039         * <li><strong>beta</strong> contains the diagonal elements of the corresponding
040         * <strong>b</strong>, normalized to be real and non-negative. The generalized
041         * eigenvalues are then the ratios ((alfr + i * alfi) / beta).</li>
042         * 
043         * <li><strong>z</strong> contains the product of the right hand transformations
044         * (for all three steps) if <strong>matz</strong> has been set to true.</li>
045         * </ul>
046         * 
047         * @param a    contains a real upper quasi-triangular matrix.
048         * @param b    contains a real upper triangular matrix. In addition, location
049         *             b[n-1][0] contains the tolerance quantity (epsb) computed and
050         *             saved in qzit.
051         * @param alfr and alfi contain the real and imaginary parts of the diagonal
052         *             elements of the triangular matrix that would be obtained if a
053         *             were reduced completely to triangular form by unitary
054         *             transformations. Non-zero values of <strong>alfi</strong> occur
055         *             in pairs, the first member positive and the second negative.
056         * @param alfi see description for <strong>alfr</strong>.
057         * @param beta contains the diagonal elements of the corresponding
058         *             <strong>b</strong>, normalized to be real and non-negative. The
059         *             generalized eigenvalues are then the ratios ((alfr + i * alfi) / beta).
060         * @param matz should be set to true. if the right hand transformations are to
061         *             be accumulated for later use in computing eigenvectors, and to
062         *             false otherwise.
063         * @param z    contains, if <strong>matz</strong> has been set to true, the
064         *             transformation matrix produced in the reductions by qzhes and
065         *             qzit, if performed, or else the identity matrix. If
066         *             <strong>matz</strong> has been set to false, z is not referenced.
067         */
068        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
069        public static void qzval(double[][] a, double[][] b, double[] alfr, double[] alfi, double[] beta, boolean matz,
070                        double[][] z) {
071
072                final int n = a.length;
073                
074                int i = 0, j;
075                int na = 0, en = 0, nn;
076                double c = 0, d = 0, e = 0;
077                double r, s, t;
078                double a1 = 0, a2 = 0, u1, u2, v1, v2;
079                double a11 = 0, a12 = 0, a21 = 0, a22 = 0;
080                double b11 = 0, b12 = 0, b22 = 0;
081                double di = 0, ei = 0;
082                double an = 0, bn = 0;
083                double cq = 0, dr = 0;
084                double cz = 0, ti = 0, tr = 0;
085                double a1i = 0, a2i = 0, a11i, a12i, a22i, a11r, a12r, a22r;
086                double sqi = 0, ssi = 0, sqr = 0, szi = 0, ssr = 0, szr = 0;
087
088                double epsb = b[n - 1][0];
089                int isw = 1;
090
091                // find eigenvalues of quasi-triangular matrices.
092                for (nn = 0; nn < n; nn++) {
093                        
094                        State state = State.Linit;
095                        StateLoop: while (state != State.Lfinal) {
096                                
097                                switch (state) {
098                                case Linit:
099                                        en = n - 1 - nn;        // TODO: check!!
100                                        na = en - 1;
101                                        if (isw == 2) {
102                                                state = State.L505;
103                                                break;
104                                        }
105                                        if (en == 0) {
106                                                state = State.L410;
107                                                break;
108                                        }
109                                        if (a[en][na] != 0.0) {
110                                                state = State.L420;
111                                                break;
112                                        }
113                                        state = State.L410;
114                                        break;
115
116                                case L410:
117                                        // 1-by-1 block, one real root
118                                        alfr[en] = a[en][en];
119                                        if (b[en][en] < 0.0) {
120                                                alfr[en] = -alfr[en];
121                                        }
122                                        beta[en] = (Math.abs(b[en][en]));
123                                        alfi[en] = 0.0;
124                                        state = State.L510;
125                                        break;
126
127                                case L420:
128                                        // 2-by-2 block
129                                        if (Math.abs(b[na][na]) <= epsb) {
130                                                state = State.L455;
131                                                break;
132                                        }
133                                        if (Math.abs(b[en][en]) > epsb) {
134                                                state = State.L430;
135                                                break;
136                                        }
137                                        a1 = a[en][en];
138                                        a2 = a[en][na];
139                                        bn = 0.0;
140                                        state = State.L435;
141                                        break;
142
143                                case L430:
144                                        an = Math.abs(a[na][na]) + Math.abs(a[na][en]) + Math.abs(a[en][na]) + Math.abs(a[en][en]);
145                                        bn = Math.abs(b[na][na]) + Math.abs(b[na][en]) + Math.abs(b[en][en]);
146                                        a11 = a[na][na] / an;
147                                        a12 = a[na][en] / an;
148                                        a21 = a[en][na] / an;
149                                        a22 = a[en][en] / an;
150                                        b11 = b[na][na] / bn;
151                                        b12 = b[na][en] / bn;
152                                        b22 = b[en][en] / bn;
153                                        e = a11 / b11;
154                                        ei = a22 / b22;
155                                        s = a21 / (b11 * b22);
156                                        t = (a22 - e * b22) / b22;
157
158                                        if (Math.abs(e) > Math.abs(ei)) {
159                                                e = ei;
160                                                t = (a11 - e * b11) / b11;
161                                        }
162
163                                        c = 0.5 * (t - s * b12);
164                                        d = c * c + s * (a12 - e * b12);
165
166                                        if (d < 0.0) {
167                                                state = State.L480;
168                                                break;
169                                        }
170
171                                        // two real roots. zero both a(en,na) and b(en,na)
172                                        e = e + c + Math.copySign(Math.sqrt(d), c);
173                                        a11 -= e * b11;
174                                        a12 -= e * b12;
175                                        a22 -= e * b22;
176
177                                        if (Math.abs(a11) + Math.abs(a12) < Math.abs(a21) + Math.abs(a22)) {
178                                                a1 = a22;
179                                                a2 = a21;
180                                        } else {
181                                                a1 = a12;
182                                                a2 = a11;
183                                        }
184                                        state = State.L435;
185                                        break;
186
187                                case L435:
188                                        // choose and apply real z
189                                        s = Math.abs(a1) + Math.abs(a2);
190                                        u1 = a1 / s;
191                                        u2 = a2 / s;
192                                        r = Math.copySign(Math.hypot(u1, u2), u1);
193                                        v1 = -(u1 + r) / r;
194                                        v2 = -u2 / r;
195                                        u2 = v2 / v1;
196
197                                        for (i = 0; i <= en; i++) {             // TODO: check!
198                                                t = a[i][en] + u2 * a[i][na];
199                                                a[i][en] = a[i][en] + t * v1;
200                                                a[i][na] = a[i][na] + t * v2;
201
202                                                t = b[i][en] + u2 * b[i][na];
203                                                b[i][en] = b[i][en] + t * v1;
204                                                b[i][na] = b[i][na] + t * v2;
205                                        }       // L440
206
207                                        if (matz) {
208                                                for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
209                                                        t = z[i][en] + u2 * z[i][na];
210                                                        z[i][en] = z[i][en] + t * v1;
211                                                        z[i][na] = z[i][na] + t * v2;
212                                                }       // L445
213                                        }
214
215                                        // L450
216                                        if (bn == 0.0) {
217                                                state = State.L475;
218                                                break;
219                                        }
220                                        if (an < Math.abs(e) * bn) {
221                                                state = State.L455;
222                                                break;
223                                        }
224                                        a1 = b[na][na];
225                                        a2 = b[en][na];
226                                        state = State.L460;
227                                        break;
228
229                                case L455:
230                                        a1 = a[na][na];
231                                        a2 = a[en][na];
232                                        state = State.L475;
233                                        break;
234
235                                case L460:
236                                        // choose and apply real q
237                                        s = Math.abs(a1) + Math.abs(a2);
238                                        if (s == 0.0) {
239                                                state = State.L475;
240                                                break;
241                                        }
242                                        u1 = a1 / s;
243                                        u2 = a2 / s;
244                                        r = Math.copySign(Math.hypot(u1, u2), u1);
245                                        v1 = -(u1 + r) / r;
246                                        v2 = -u2 / r;
247                                        u2 = v2 / v1;
248
249                                        for (j = na; j < n; j++) {
250                                                t = a[na][j] + u2 * a[en][j];
251                                                a[na][j] = a[na][j] + t * v1;
252                                                a[en][j] = a[en][j] + t * v2;
253
254                                                t = b[na][j] + u2 * b[en][j];
255                                                b[na][j] = b[na][j] + t * v1;
256                                                b[en][j] = b[en][j] + t * v2;
257                                        }       // L470
258                                        
259                                        state = State.L475;
260                                        break;
261
262                                case L475:
263                                        a[en][na] = 0.0;
264                                        b[en][na] = 0.0;
265                                        alfr[na] = a[na][na];
266                                        alfr[en] = a[en][en];
267
268                                        if (b[na][na] < 0.0)
269                                                alfr[na] = -alfr[na];
270
271                                        if (b[en][en] < 0.0)
272                                                alfr[en] = -alfr[en];
273
274                                        beta[na] = (Math.abs(b[na][na]));
275                                        beta[en] = (Math.abs(b[en][en]));
276                                        alfi[en] = 0.0;
277                                        alfi[na] = 0.0;
278                                        state = State.L505;
279                                        break;
280
281                                case L480:
282                                        // two complex roots
283                                        e = e + c;
284                                        ei = Math.sqrt(-d);
285                                        a11r = a11 - e * b11;
286                                        a11i = ei * b11;
287                                        a12r = a12 - e * b12;
288                                        a12i = ei * b12;
289                                        a22r = a22 - e * b22;
290                                        a22i = ei * b22;
291
292                                        if (Math.abs(a11r) + Math.abs(a11i) + Math.abs(a12r) + Math.abs(a12i) < 
293                                                Math.abs(a21) + Math.abs(a22r) + Math.abs(a22i)) {
294                                                // L482;
295                                                a1 = a22r;
296                                                a1i = a22i;
297                                                a2 = -a21;
298                                                a2i = 0.0;
299                                        } else {
300                                                a1 = a12r;
301                                                a1i = a12i;
302                                                a2 = -a11r;
303                                                a2i = -a11i;
304                                        }
305                                        // goto L485;
306                                        state = State.L485;
307                                        break;
308
309                                case L485:
310                                        // choose complex z
311                                        cz = Math.hypot(a1, a1i);
312                                        if (cz == 0.0) {
313                                                // L487
314                                                szr = 1.0;
315                                                szi = 0.0;
316                                        } else {
317                                                szr = (a1 * a2 + a1i * a2i) / cz;
318                                                szi = (a1 * a2i - a1i * a2) / cz;
319                                                r = Math.sqrt(cz * cz + szr * szr + szi * szi);
320                                                cz = cz / r;
321                                                szr = szr / r;
322                                                szi = szi / r;
323                                        }
324
325                                        // L490:
326                                        if (an < (Math.abs(e) + ei) * bn) {
327                                                // L492
328                                                a1 = cz * a11 + szr * a12;
329                                                a1i = szi * a12;
330                                                a2 = cz * a21 + szr * a22;
331                                                a2i = szi * a22;
332                                        } else {
333                                                a1 = cz * b11 + szr * b12;
334                                                a1i = szi * b12;
335                                                a2 = szr * b22;
336                                                a2i = szi * b22;
337                                        }
338
339                                        // L495: choose complex q
340                                        cq = Math.hypot(a1, a1i);
341                                        if (cq == 0.0) {
342                                                sqr = 1.0;
343                                                sqi = 0.0;
344                                        } else {
345                                                sqr = (a1 * a2 + a1i * a2i) / cq;
346                                                sqi = (a1 * a2i - a1i * a2) / cq;
347                                                r = Math.sqrt(cq * cq + sqr * sqr + sqi * sqi);
348                                                cq = cq / r;
349                                                sqr = sqr / r;
350                                                sqi = sqi / r;
351                                        }
352
353                                        // L500: compute diagonal elements that would result if transformations were applied
354                                        ssr = sqr * szr + sqi * szi;
355                                        ssi = sqr * szi - sqi * szr;
356                                        i = 0;
357                                        tr = cq * cz * a11 + cq * szr * a12 + sqr * cz * a21 + ssr * a22;
358                                        ti = cq * szi * a12 - sqi * cz * a21 + ssi * a22;
359                                        dr = cq * cz * b11 + cq * szr * b12 + ssr * b22;
360                                        di = cq * szi * b12 + ssi * b22;
361                                        state = State.L503;
362                                        break;
363
364                                case L502:
365                                        i = 1;
366                                        tr = ssr * a11 - sqr * cz * a12 - cq * szr * a21 + cq * cz * a22;
367                                        ti = -ssi * a11 - sqi * cz * a12 + cq * szi * a21;
368                                        dr = ssr * b11 - sqr * cz * b12 + cq * cz * b22;
369                                        di = -ssi * b11 - sqi * cz * b12;
370                                        state = State.L503;
371                                        break;
372
373                                case L503:
374                                        t = ti * dr - tr * di;
375                                        j = na;
376                                        if (t < 0.0) {
377                                                j = en;
378                                        }
379                                        r = Math.hypot(dr, di);
380                                        beta[j] = bn * r;
381                                        alfr[j] = an * (tr * dr + ti * di) / r;
382                                        alfi[j] = an * t / r;
383                                        if (i == 0) {
384                                                // goto L502;
385                                                state = State.L502;
386                                                break;
387                                        }
388                                        state = State.L505;
389                                        break;
390
391                                case L505:
392                                        isw = 3 - isw;
393                                        state = State.L510;
394                                        break;
395
396                                case L510:
397                                        state = State.Lfinal;
398                                        break;
399
400                                case Lfinal:
401                                        throw new RuntimeException("this should never happen!");
402                                        //                                      break StateLoop;
403                                }
404                        }       // end StateLoop: while (state
405
406                }       // L510 end for (nn ..
407
408                b[n - 1][0] = epsb;
409                
410        } // end of qzval()
411
412        private enum State {
413                Linit, Lfinal, L505, L410, L420, L455, L430, L435, L480, L475, L485, L503, L502, L460, L510
414        }
415
416}
